scripts.build: vite build && node scripts/generate-runtime-config.cjs && cp -rf dist/* ../tools/assets-browser
scripts.build:local: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=local vite build && node scripts/generate-runtime-config.cjs && cp -rf dist/* ../tools/assets-browser
scripts.build:dev: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development vite build && node scripts/generate-runtime-config.cjs && cp -rf dist/* ../tools/assets-browser
scripts.build:staging: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=staging vite build && node scripts/generate-runtime-config.cjs && cp -rf dist/* ../tools/assets-browser
scripts.build:prod: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && node scripts/generate-runtime-config.cjs && cp -rf dist/* ../tools/assets-browser
scripts.build:static: vite build && cp -rf dist/* ../tools/assets-browser && node scripts/generate-safe-config.cjs
scripts.build:deploy: vite build && cp -rf dist/* ../tools/assets-browser && node scripts/generate-deployment-config.cjs
scripts.build:embed: vite build && cp -rf dist/* ../tools/assets-browser && node scripts/generate-html-with-config.cjs
